explanation: [0-0] A man in a gray shirt and jeans sits on a beige sofa holding a Pepsi bottle. In front of him is a brown table with another Pepsi bottle on it. At the top of the screen, we see famous football players' faces with puzzled expressions. Behind them is a black face with a white question mark. Below the image is a white subtitle. The background is white, with a window on the right. On a small white table next to it is a desk lamp, and behind it is a green plant.

[0-4] A yellow inverted triangle appears above Messi's head. Messi throws the bottle in his hand onto the table, and a "covering mouth" emoji appears next to him. A green frame with a white checkmark appears on the screen.
